data.name: Anjali, Who Bleeds Silver // Those Forsaken by the Moon
data.type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Werewolf // Legendary Creature — Eldrazi Werewolf

card_faces.name: Anjali, Who Bleeds Silver
card_faces.oracle_text:
Duskbringer {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this card for {3}{U}{R} or pay {3}{U}{R} as a sorcery. When you do, it becomes night.)
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Anjali, create a 3/2 Wolf creature token, then you may put a permanent card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Daybound

card_faces.name: Those Forsaken by the Moon
card_faces.oracle_text:
Dawnbringer {3}{G} (You may pay {3}{G} as a sorcery. When you do, it becomes day.)
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Those Forsaken by the Moon, if you control a token creature, discover X, where X is the greatest power among creature tokens you control.
Nightbound
